info.name: Bard Class from TCE
info.description: New features for Bard class from the Tasha's Cauldron of Everything
info.author: Wizards of the Coast

description.p: The Bard class gain the following additional features:

setters.set: Additional features for the Bard class

description.p: If a creature has a Bardic Inspiration die from you and casts a spell that restores hit points or deals damage, the creature can roll that die and choose a target affected by the spell. Add the number rolled as a bonus to the hit points regained or the damage dealt. The Bardic Inspiration die is then lost.
